short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautify your new tab page with a clock, aesthetic backgrounds, and motivational greetings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make every new tab feel like your very own space with the Flocus New Tab Extension. Elevate your setup with stunning background worlds, a clock, and personalized greetings that keep you motivated.

· Customize your new tab’s appearance with a variety of aesthetic themes. Whether you’re into dreamy lofi-inspired scenes, soothing animated gradients, or minimalist monochrome vibes, there’s a look to match every workspace and mood.

· Get encouraging messages throughout your day, greeting you by name! From the moment you open your browser to the last task of the day, Flocus greets you with positivity at every step.

· Keep track of time in style with a bold clock. It offers the perfect blend of function and form, whether you’re staying on schedule or taking the perfect setup photo.

· Quick shortcut to Flocus app for all features

Loving the extension? Dive into the full Flocus web app for the complete experience! More themes, quotes, to-dos, a focus timer, ambient focus sounds, and so much more!

Check out the full Flocus dashboard: https://flocus.com/
